comment._content: I had the pleasure of meeting General Davis at the NASM in D.C. in 1991.

comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content:
only ever read his autobiography
one heck of a steadfast man against all the odds of institutional racism

he won
they won (the oppressed)
we won

against racism and bigotry
